events.description: Venezuela's acting president has signed into law an amnesty bill that could lead to the release of politicians, activists, lawyers and many others. The approval marks a stark turn for the nation.

events.title: Nearly 2 million highly educated Germans at risk of poverty
events.description: The figures indicate that although more people earned advanced qualifications, many did not secure well-paid jobs.

events.title: Eric Dane, 'Grey's Anatomy' and 'Euphoria' star, dies at 53
events.description: Eric Dane, the actor remembered as the heartthrob Dr. Mark "McSteamy" Sloan on "Grey's Anatomy," has died after a battle with ALS. His memoir is due to be published later this year.
events.ticker_label: ğŸ’¥ Eric Dane, 'Grey's Anatomy' and 'Euphoria' star, dies at 53

events.title: Trump orders Pentagon to release files on UFOs and aliens
events.description: "I don't know if they're real or not," US President Trump said of aliens. But he said interest in the topic led him to order the declassification of information related to extraterrestrial life.

events.title: Ex-Prince Andrew: What you need to know
events.description: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, formerly Prince Andrew, looks to have become the first British royal to be arrested. His ties to Jeffrey Epstein are well-established but not the only time he has been in the public spotlight.

events.title: Trump's 'Board of Peace' members pledge $7 billion for Gaza
events.description: "Board of Peace" members have vowed to provide billions for Gaza's reconstruction, with some also sending troops. US President Donald Trump also pledged $10 billion, but did not say what for.

events.title: Who are Donald Trump's 'kindred spirits' in Europe?
events.description: US President Donald Trump has many enthusiastic supporters in Europe â€” but his plans to take over Greenland have cost him some fans.

events.title: 'Hallmark of genocide' found in Sudan's el-Fasher â€” UN
events.description: An independent fact-finding mission said the paramilitary RSF's capture of el-Fasher bore the "hallmarks of genocide." Graphic footage circulated in October showed RSF members carrying out mass killings and other crimes.

events.title: Olympic Knitting: US Biathlets spend their spare time a little differently
events.description: In Milan, US Biathlets spend their spare time a little differently.

events.title: Seven suspects charged over killing of French far-right activist
events.description: Prosecutor Thierry Dran told a press conference he had requested "intentional homicide" charges against seven men and recommended they remain in custody to avoid any "disturbance to public order".

events.title: 2030 Winter Games: Will France rise to the challenge?
events.description: After lighting up the streets of Paris in 2024, the Olympic flame will be making a return to France in 2030, when the French Alps are set to welcome the Winter Olympics and Paralympics. Organisers have promised financially and environmentally sustainable games, where 93 percent of pre-existing infrastructure will be reused. However, with only four years to go and a number of criticisms, will France be able to deliver on time and on budget?

events.title: Undercover police go dancing in lion costume to catch serial burglar
events.description: Thai police went undercover in a traditional lion costume in order to get close enough to a serial burglar to pounce on them and arrest them.

events.title: Mourinho has 'failed us' over racism row, says ex-Man Utd star
events.description: Former Manchester United player Mikael Silvestre has claimed Jose Mourinho has "failed us" over his response to Vinicius Junior's allegations of racist abuse.

events.title: Ex-Victoria's Secret mogul says Epstein 'stole vast sums from our family'
events.description: A billionaire mogul says paedophile financier Jeffrey Epstein stole vast sums from his family.

events.title: Poland withdraws from treaty banning antipersonnel mines
events.description: Poland has officially left the Ottawa Convention, which bans the use of antipersonnel mines

events.title: Ex-South Korean president remains defiant following life sentence for rebellion
events.description: Ousted South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol on Friday remained defiant in his first reaction to a life sentence imposed by a Seoul court for his short-lived declaration of martial law but didnâ€™t clearly say whether he would appeal

events.title: A macabre dispute has kept the body of Zambia's former president unburied for months
events.description: A bitter feud in Zambia has left former President Edgar Lunguâ€™s body unburied in a South African funeral home for more than eight months

events.title: Thai police go undercover as lion dancers to nab a serial burglar
events.description: Thai police say they've caught an elusive serial burglar by going undercover as lion dancers at a temple fair

events.title: North Korea opens major party congress with Kim emphasizing economy
events.description: North Korea has opened its most important political event, where leader Kim Jong Un is expected to map out his domestic and foreign policy agenda for the next five years and further entrench his familyâ€™s authoritarian rule

events.title: A resistance leader in Myanmar turns himself in to the army after clashing with rival force
events.description: A resistance leader in Myanmar has surrendered to the army after his group clashed with rival forces fighting against the military government

events.title: Pope's grand tour of Italy over the next few months takes him to Lampedusa and beyond
events.description: The Vatican has announced that Pope Leo XIV will travel up and down the Italian peninsula over the next few months

events.title: Grain ATMs and hunger maps: AI innovations spotlighted at UN agency showcase in India
events.description: Artificial intelligence solutions that transform the way food assistance reaches people facing hunger were on display during an exhibition at an AI meeting this week in New Delhi, India.

events.title: 6 mothers who 'cherished time together' among victims in avalanche near Lake Tahoe
events.description: Six of the eight victims in an avalanche in Sierra Nevada near Lake Tahoe have been identified as outdoor-loving mothers and seasoned skiers who regularly traveled together.

events.title: Woman charged with animal abandonment after leaving dog tied at JetBlue counter at Las Vegas airport
events.description: A woman was arrested at a Las Vegas airport after tying her dog to a baggage sizer at a JetBlue ticket counter and walking away, police said.
events.ticker_label: ğŸ’¥ Woman charged with animal abandonment after leaving dog tied at JetBlue counter at Las Vegas airport

events.title: University of Texas System to restrict teaching 'unnecessarily controversial subjects'
events.description: University of Texas System Board of Regents approved rule allowing students to graduate without studying "unnecessarily controversial subjects."

events.title: Texas judge declares yogurt shop murder suspects innocent after 34 years
events.description: A Texas judge declared four men innocent in the 1991 Austin yogurt shop murders after 30-plus years. DNA evidence identified the real killer, ending a wrongful conviction.
events.ticker_label: ğŸ’¥ Texas judge declares yogurt shop murder suspects innocent after 34 years

events.title: Navy reservist on active duty accused of murdering wife believed to have fled to Hong Kong
events.description: A Navy reservist is accused of murdering his wife in Norfolk, Virginia, and fleeing to Hong Kong the same day her body was found in a kitchen freezer.

events.title: Top US military commander visits Venezuela, meets new leader following operation to capture Maduro
events.description: U.S. Southern Command leader makes visit to Venezuela after NicolÃ¡s Maduro's capture, meeting with interim leaders in Caracas to discuss security cooperation.

events.title: Russia urges Iran, 'all parties' in Middle East to show restraint amid US military buildup
events.description: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov is calling on Iran and "all parties" in the Middle East to show restraint as the U.S. continues military buildup.

events.title: South Korean court rules exâ€‘President Yoon Suk Yeol guilty in insurrection trial
events.description: South Korean court sentences former President Yoon Suk Yeol to life in prison for leading insurrection after he declared martial law in December 2024.

events.title: Ukraine makes fastest gains in years as Russia talks stall, exploiting cracks in Kremlin command
events.description: Ukrainian forces exploit Russian communication disruptions to mount successful counteroffensive east of Zaporizhzhia, pushing back enemy advances.
